name: Street Toilet
description:
Street Toilet

A SHORT CHOMP OF CONTENT

What if...there was a street toilet?

Along the streets of southern Californian urban sprawl are the remnants of waste receptacles turned to waste themselves. A toilet, unplugged from plumbing, becomes nothing. Here you come, walking your dog but also on your phone. Unlike the toilet, you are plugged in. But like the toilet, existing pointlessly in a nihilist dystopia.

Perhaps you can make something to justify your existence, turning even your caretaking obligations into content. Perhaps you can repurpose the detritus lining the street.  What does it mean? What could it mean? It is content. It is nothing. It is #streettoilet.
